mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user_info (id, user_no, user_name, aliases, phone, address, sex, create_time, status, profile_picture) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aliases,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{profilePicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user_info set user_no = #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aliases = #{aliases,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, profile_picture = #{profilePicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_no, user_name, aliases, phone, address, sex, create_time, status, profile_picture from user_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_no, user_name, aliases, phone, address, sex, create_time, status, profile_picture from user_info
